lender.name: Ashlee
lender.loan_because: Because I care and want to help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the elderly. Offering them a safe and enjoyable place to live when they can no longer live on their own.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Some choose to fight wars in order to spread freedom. I loan because giving individuals opportunity is how freedom is truly spread.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room and give medical care.

lender.name: KIM AND PAUL
lender.loan_because: WE FEEL LIKE WE ARE INVESTING IN THE WORLD.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I don't because I have an irregular heartbeat.

lender.name: jim
lender.loan_because: If they do better there...they won't come here. If they get enough capitalism.... I won't have to go there and "work."
lender.occupational_info: Airborne combat support.

lender.name: Radosveta
lender.loan_because: I believe people have good hearts; if given a chance anyone can change their life; want to end world poverty

lender.name: Ginelle
lender.loan_because: Just a little bit of my money can make a huge difference to someone else. It gives me perspective when I start to feel sorry for myself.
lender.occupational_info: I became a nurse so that I can help sick people to get better and to keep healthy people healthy.

lender.name: Nancy & Scott
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish...

lender.name: Maria Z.
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with many things in my life (a loving family, a college education, financial stability, and personal security). I was born in country with extreme poverty (Ecuador) but moved to the United States at a young age. My experiences have helped me realize how lucky I truly am and, in turn, inspires me to help others pull themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Jason
lender.occupation: Systems Engineer and one cool mofo!!

lender.name: babs
lender.loan_because: After a trip to West Africa this year I was so happy to learn about Kiva. With great pleasure I am able to give the women of Africa a helping hand to start a business. It is vital that we help others in the world!!!

lender.name: Debbie and Mike
lender.loan_because: We care because we believe in the inexhaustible capacity of human capital. We give because we can.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I have a small business myself, and I want to empower others, especially women, to improve their lives through micro-enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for small to medium manufacturing companies.

lender.name: Jamey
lender.loan_because: Why not help, if you can?
lender.occupational_info: I help people by massaging their backs, necks, shoulders and legs. I especially enjoy working with pregnant women.

lender.name: Marten
lender.loan_because: This website really makes the world a smaller place. It's an amazing feeling I can help someone in a developing country this easily. We have so much to give and these people can do so much with our help. I am proud of all the entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: I am a webeditor.

lender.name: Norman
lender.loan_because: People need help and I can help.
lender.occupational_info: Jet pilot

lender.name: Julia and Joanne
lender.loan_because: Joanne and I want to help women make their lives and their children's lives better. We are excited and proud of the successes achieved by the hard working women who get loans through Kiva, and we are glad to do our little part to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I write documentation about XBRL business reporting software; Joanne is an honor-roll student in 6th grade.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to make a difference. As an artist I hope to target my loans to businesses that support artisans.
lender.occupational_info: I am artist (water-color, digital) and I design websites. I also work for an amazing non-profit, Bridges to Understanding, that connects youth worldwide through storytelling and problem-solving.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: It is a fun way to help out hard working people.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer software.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: I want to be a responsible global citizen.
lender.occupational_info: I am a healer, teacher and I also make jewelry from fair-trade natural gems and recycled silver and gold.

lender.name: Earl
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to give someone else a chance :-)
lender.occupational_info: I manage Cost, Scope and Schedule on small to midsized projects (5K to ~2M). I am married and have two young sons. I reside in rural Pennsylvania

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: it makes the world a better place ... It's the least we can do for those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Computer and web development expert.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.loan_because: By sharing we will find a way

lender.name: ELAINE
lender.loan_because: My faith encourages me to reach out to my fellow brothers and sisters around the world. I think Kiva is an excellent way to lend a helping hand and a way of continuing the circle of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in a hospital as a social worker for thirteen years and retired three years ago.

lender.name: Sushil
lender.loan_because: I like to promote entrepreneurship in locations where normally it would be very difficult to procure capital.
lender.occupational_info:
I design computer chips for a large technology company.
I also own my own company where I assist small business in integrating technologies to assist them in being more responsive to growing demands and reducing cost.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: Once a bee was drowning in a pond. I reached out into the pond with a stick and put it in front of the bee so he could climb on. That's all he needed - a little something solid to put his feet on, and he was able to take off into the sky! ~Sometimes just a little boost can save someone's life.~
lender.occupational_info: I promote healthy and happy lifestyles.

lender.name: Candra
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a barista. i prepare overpriced espresso drinks for funny people.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because:
I like honest people who work hard to improve their lives.
BECAUSE I am humbled by your courage to be an entrepreneur, to be a provider of your family, to be model of your community.
lender.occupational_info: My daily work consists of running a community pharmacy, dispensing drugs, talking with doctors about drug therapy choices, talking with insurance providers to get explanation on coverage for my patients. I give health care advices to my patients, especially about drugs. I also do vaccinations, mostly flu shots.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are overlooked by traditional financial institutions.
lender.occupational_info: I live in a rural area and teach Business courses online

lender.name: Kimberli
lender.occupation: Educator....looking for an adjunct professor posi
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a educator

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It is important in this day and age to show kindness to those in need. If we all help one another we will spread goodness throughout the earth and create peace.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with mental illness and advocate for those who can not advocate for themselves.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Those fortunate enough to be born in first world countries should extend their wealth to help out their fellow human beings
lender.occupational_info: I design video games for kids 8-16

lender.name: Vincent Coppola
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Investment banking, mergers and acquisitions

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody deserves a break.

lender.name: Abby and Kenneth
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can. We can make a small difference and that adds up. We loan because we need to bridge the gap between multi-national banks and the needs of the individual entrepreneur who is making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bank and my husband works in an advertising agency.

lender.name: The White Family
lender.loan_because: We Are All One.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Every donation, no matter how small, helps someone out there who needs it.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro-credit over hand-outs in building sustainable initiatives. I have been a volunteer in international development in Africa and South-Asia for many years and saw a lot of money wasted through governments and intermediaries. I want very much to see this creative approach to direct support work out.
lender.occupational_info: I help resolve disputes between banks and their customers that they have been unable to resolve themselves.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician / actor.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a simple way to make a real difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Juliana and Ted
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's important to me to break down the definition of "neighbor" to go beyond street, cunty, state or country.

lender.name: Frankie
lender.loan_because: I think micro loans are so much smarter than almost any "giving" I can do. Instead of a bag of grain that last a couple days, they have a livelihood, a goal and an opportunity to see capitalism at work. In addition, it gives a person great dignity and a sense of self worth to repay loan from money they have made!
lender.occupational_info: I educate children in reading, writing, social studies and math.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.occupational_info: I support all kinds of people as they work on making healthy choices to enhance their quality of life.

lender.name: Martins
lender.loan_because: I love that people can connect across the world to help each other! This is such a fantastic experience to be a part of helping another person becoming economically sustainable and not depend on high interest loans, which become a form of financial slavery. My husband owns his own business and owes no one a dime! It's an empowering position to be at cause rather than at effect in life. :)
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school English.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: it's a lot more satisfying to know that you helped some people try to get out of poverty than to get a measly 5% interest in savings on a couple bucks

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurism and small business are the keys to economic development, particularly in rural areas.
lender.occupational_info: I find money to support the programs in my non-profit agency that help the poor living in rural areas.

lender.name: jill
lender.loan_because: i can!
lender.occupational_info: I cut patterns and work with a team of sewers to fit costumes to actresses and actors in a local theatre.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Good question.

lender.name: Jeannine
lender.loan_because: I have been traveling thru Africa and this country, her people, and the cultures have captured my heart. I want to contribute to the success of those people in Africa who are doing so much to increase their families lives and the education of their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker working in residential real estate. I have been an entrepreneur all my business career and realize the dedication and belief it takes to make your business successful. I believe in giving forward to those people who are also taking risks and challenges.

lender.name: Lin
lender.occupation: Face Reader - Trainer- Jury consultant - Business
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering a person to succeed in their dreams.. I recently read Bill Clinton's book " Giving" and was drawn to the opportunity to give back through "Kiva"
lender.occupational_info: For the last 15 years I have been presenting Face Reading workshops and seminars as a certified Face Reader. Giving people a tool to understand each other at a new level and see them self through new eyes. This is my way of improving the world ----One Face At A Time!

lender.name: Sherri & Ty
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Steve J.
lender.loan_because: I've traveled enough to know how incredibly fortunate I am.
lender.occupational_info: Study Abroad Coordinator at the University of Hawaii-Leeward Community College.

lender.name: Jennifer & Justin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.

lender.name: Suzanne E
lender.loan_because: i want to help, no matter how small, the people in Africa who have such big hearts and were so kind to us when we visited several years ago.
lender.occupational_info: i am retired, but used to work at a non profit organization teaching people to prevent crime and how to stay safe. Now, I have a pet photography business with a friend.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I want to help women be successful and happy.

lender.name: Marek
lender.loan_because: I admire the determination, hard work and courage of the people being in the difficult situation but trying to change it. I just try to help them.

lender.name: Lyla
lender.loan_because: it is helping people and it is also generous.
lender.occupational_info: I am in third grade and I enjoy playing soccer and Korean dancing. I also like to ski and run fast. I want to be a lawyer when I grow up.

lender.name: Rodney
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be poor (by American standards) and how much a small loan can be a big help.

lender.name: toni
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given the opportunity to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I provide healthcare to all segments of the population, old and young. I also teach medicine to new, graduating doctors.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: Many people are deprived of opportunities not because they don't deserve them, but because of where they were born and the situation they were born into. I want to be able to help hard-working people reach their dreams. Instead of giving hand outs I appreciate that KIVA grants loans to people so they can work for what they want and feel proud of what they are able to accomplish.

lender.name: Blake
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm studying political science at university, and I hope to move forward into a career in law.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in helping people, and curious about building cross cultural business relationships.
lender.occupational_info: We manufacture doors, plywood and composite parts. We purchase wood veneers from all over the world to build architectural items for homes and offices.

lender.name: Greg & Cat
lender.loan_because: It is a good opportunity.

lender.name: Common Sense
lender.loan_because: Giving Back and Being Kind is Common Sense.
lender.occupational_info: Doing what I can...

lender.name: Alvaro
lender.loan_because: I want to get better quality of grass for feeding cows instead of continue cutting trees from forest in order to convert them into grasslands. Better quality per m2, instead of more space. Also preparing a plan for reforestation inconjuction with the community.
lender.occupational_info: Passionate, Hard, Beautiful

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: "Where much is given, much is required."
lender.occupational_info: I raise 2 small children and am expecting another baby in March.

lender.name: Rutherford Family
lender.loan_because: We have everything. Two cars, grocery stores, safety, water, etc. I would want someone to help me if I was not so lucky.

lender.name: Saira and Daniel
lender.loan_because: We want to encourage the growth and success of friends around the world by supporting their ambitions. The Kiva experience offers a chance to help someone directly and be able to witness the outcome.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: I like the micro loan concept. My father helped me fund my first professional job with a micro loan and it helped me become independent.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph people and products in studio and on location for advertising use.

lender.name: Aran
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me get started. Now it is my turn.
lender.occupational_info: I run a library in a public middle school and also teach English as a Second Language to refugee students from around the world.

lender.name: Ron & Loma
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate between small and large business owners and the owners of the land/building they occupy.

lender.name: Julie Sanders
lender.loan_because: Through international travel, I have spent time in some of the world's poorest regions. The lack of resources and infrastructure can be disheartening and frustrating. I know that so little goes a long way in developing countries and through micro finance loans we can help improve lives all over the world. Thank you Kiva crew for providing the platform. Amazing work!
lender.occupational_info: I have worked as an international travel consultant for The National Educational Travel Council and Airtreks. Currently I am an editor at Night+Day, Cool Cities series by Pulse Guides.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: The better we make the rest of the world, the better our home will be.
lender.occupational_info: I keep two-way radios, telephones, and other electronic devices working.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: My family and I would like to help those that are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer all day to help manage our health care data.

lender.name: Sherry/Cliveous
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed in many ways. Along the way others have been helpful to us as we grew and developed-We wish to pass this along to others so they may have an opportunity
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Investing/apartment management

lender.name: Sukoshi
lender.occupation: I help people feel better and get healthier

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: I want to help you help your community.
lender.occupational_info: I help nurses nationwide perform their job better and under easier conditions.

lender.name: Maria and Andrew
lender.loan_because: We are just trying to help.
lender.occupational_info: We are graduate students, I study Public Health and my husband studies Social Work.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: It would be nice to see an end to hunger and poverty in my lifetime. Just like the woman in another country, our desires are very similar -- to seek a better life for ourselves and our families. Part of the registration fees for small events I hold in my community go to fund female entrepreneurs worldwide. It's great to see women helping women across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I support women entrepreneurs who seek to live out a passionate living by running a program called Ladies Who Launch in Santa Barbara, CA. My days really vary. I could be leading workshops in the evenings and running my online store during the day. Right now I'm working on launching an e-commerce solution that will help online stores automate their shipping and fulfillment process to save them time, money, and headaches.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: my friend, Jackie, sent me a gift certificate for my birthday. Sharing our resources is the right thing to do when you cannot even think of one gift that would be just as appreciated by any one of your friends or family members...
lender.occupational_info: It's my job to motivate children to become life-long learners and reach for the stars...and I can't think of any better way to utilize my time and talents.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: It is so wonderful to help other people in need. Together, we can change the world one person at a time.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling that giving provides.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I just want to help others and feel this is a great way to do it.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do.

lender.name: ELISE
lender.loan_because: "There, but for fortune, go you or I."

lender.name: lori
lender.loan_because: i care i can

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: While I don't have a whole lot of money, I have some. I also know what its like to be a single mother with children, trying to make a living. I give to a charity here, but I don't know where it goes. So, I think that by giving to KIVA, while I still don't know where it will go, I at least hope it will be where it will help someone, and not pay for a charity's overhead.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a semi truck and trailer, which together have 18 wheels. I deliver the sports equipment my company makes to their three warehouses, which are in my town. I have driven for construction companies, going out of town to work, but I like this much better.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: As someone with enough in my pocket, enough to eat, and enough luxuries, I feel it is my duty to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have a lot of fun writing software.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I believe the KIVA model empowers people to improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I offer an economic alternative to centralized energy generation by way of distributed solar electric power.

lender.name: Ned
lender.loan_because: It provides opportunity to enterprising folks
lender.occupational_info: Helping people invest to finance their dreams

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I have a few extra dollars and am grateful for the opportunity that Kiva has given me to be able to directly help people that are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick people.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I think an important part of being a caring human being is to share what you can with others. I'm fortunate to have some funds which I can use to help others help themselves. It makes me feel good to be able to lend a hand and, maybe let others know that there are Americans who aren't out to exploit everyone for their own gains.
lender.occupational_info: I own my own business, along with my wife who is my partner. Our business is providing insurance and investment products and services to the public, as well as providing these same items to independent agents on a wholesale basis.

lender.name: Siobhan
lender.loan_because: sometimes the smallest things have the biggest impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student attending the University of Connecticut.

lender.name: Michael O'Connor
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in growing up and living in countries where educational and financial help is available. Other people have not been as lucky and I'd like to help them in whatever small way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer software.

lender.name: Md. Mostafizur
lender.loan_because: cause I like to make a change

lender.name: HUGO
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that can barely get help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people start off financially in regards to banking relationships...checking, savings accounts, credit cards, that then progress to major bank relationships...loans, mortgages, etc.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: It takes so ridiculously little to jump start someone's dreams. And because other people have done the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of beautiful things and lovely people. I also help children who have been hurt.

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world by helping as many people as possible to realize their goals and dreams and by sharing God's love for them.
lender.occupational_info: I am the city secretary (city clerk) for the City of Tomball, Texas. I work for the mayor, city council, city staff, and the citizens of Tomball, providing information and assistance, running elections, and maintaining the city's records.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with plenty, but remember when I did not think I was.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 3 small children. I help my husband with his business as a lawyer. When my children are older and in school I hope to expand my own small farm business.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible to make a big difference without costing more than an average person can afford to give.
lender.occupational_info: I design materials and services to help companies run better.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I want to be an example to my sons.
lender.occupational_info: Investment sales & advisory services.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together and it's just the right thing to do.

lender.name: Dariusz
lender.loan_because: I feel very happy when people gladly accept my help and I know that it's helping them.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to dance Ballroom and Hip-Hop. Usually private lessons.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: My own sewing business has supported me for many years and I especially want to help other women be self-supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I make custom draperies and bedding.

lender.name: Ernesto & Peter
lender.loan_because: this world is an unujst and unfair world and we are the only ones who can fix it.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the process of establishing my own retail website

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in others lives
lender.occupational_info: I also own my own business. I make ice cream and sell it in a small shop.

lender.name: Francis
lender.loan_because: This is the least I can do....
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs for telecommunication equipments.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe in free markets. I see KIVA as an opportunity to help people help themselves. Access to capital is key to improving responsible peoples' lives. Capital invested in these small businesses breeds more capitalists, and, I hope, strengthens free markets everywhere. Everybody wins.
lender.occupational_info: I work with lawyers and expect to be licensed soon.

lender.name: Marti
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the entrepreneurial spirit and want to support others in making their dreams a reality.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I help others by finding them jobs.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: i believe no man is an island

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It's nice to being able to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for writing computer software and managing computer scientists / technical staff.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: They can use it better than I could, it'd just be resting in my account.

lender.name: loraine
lender.loan_because: i want to help make a little diference to those who need it

lender.name: Jill & Graeme
lender.loan_because: How could you not?

lender.name: Javier
lender.loan_because: Yo pienso que esta es una buena forma de ayudar al desarrollo de estos territorios.

lender.name: Ty
lender.loan_because: This provides me a unique and personal way to be involved with the international community.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus!
lender.occupational_info: Loving people and encouraging them to have a full, abundant life, the one God wants to give us all.

lender.name: Marita
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me abundantly. I give out of a thankful heart.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher, and I work part time as a Marriage Family Therapist. I am the Executive Director of Saboba's Hope, Inc, a 501 c 3 charity helping the Saboba Medical Centre in Saboba, Ghana!

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I am a student and i would like to help people across the world even if i dont have much money, Kiva offers me that opportunity

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I want to set up an internet based christian radio station that will be used to reach out to the unreached as long as the person is connected to the internet.
lender.occupational_info: I am an internet broadcaster, broadcasting gospel music and preaching and teaching from great men of God from all accross the globe, as of now i work for somebody but I want to establish my own outfit

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I care about people who are in need, and I like the idea of helping with a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a Lutheran church on Long Island in New York.

lender.name: Jeff Feldman
lender.loan_because: I understand the importance of each dollar we have, each drop of clean water that is available, every morsel of food there is to be eaten and the education of people.
lender.occupational_info: Creating "Ultra-Ecological, Organic & Sustainable" communities - where your food grows all around you, your water comes from springs and rivers underneath you. A place where you can live in harmony with yourself, each other and the environment we all share.

lender.name: Mark & Kate
lender.loan_because: In a small way we can help those less fortunate to become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work in retail management and my wife works as a teacher.

lender.name: Kaye
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the right thing to give. Before the grace of God go I.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with problems that they have when they are working in the information system called SAP.

lender.name: Vittorio
lender.loan_because: People who want to work should be able to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: Legal.

lender.name: Angelwealth
lender.loan_because: "Give, and it will be given to you: good measure, pressed down, shaken together, and running over, will be given to you. For with the same measure you measure it will be measured back to you."
lender.occupational_info: Sales and Property Management

lender.name: Leah Gage
lender.loan_because: my mom taught me it was a responsible way to engage in international development.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Oikocredit USA, part of Oikocredit, another microlending organization with a social mission and wide reach in the developing world

lender.name: Nigel & Kelly
lender.loan_because: Life is short.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.occupation: Board Agent National Labor Relations Board
lender.loan_because: I'm spending my "economic stimulus" check!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to better there lifes, and if I can help them with their dreams, I well.
lender.occupational_info: I help indiviuals and companies, with investment ideas, insurance needs, heath and dental plans, retirement plans

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and want to do something that directly makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Our group facilitates the trading of various goods from around the world. Such as sugar and honey.

lender.name: Neelima
lender.loan_because: Economic empowerment is dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Serial Entrepreneur with a strong interest in social and economic justice, political activism and eco advocacy.

lender.name: Dave and Brigette
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a fair shot at success.
lender.occupational_info: We own a bed and breakfast inn in the beautiful mountains of western North Carolina.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I believe in every person's right to a fair chance to support herself.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it means nothing to have money and not use it to better the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are abolitionists who operate our own economic empowerment company. We sell goods made by survivors of human trafficking and other vulnerable communities and donate the profits.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: How can you not? I respect people building a life for themselves. I do it for myself every day.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my kids that even a little bit of help can make a difference in today's world.
lender.occupational_info: I develop websites and applications that run on websites.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: This is a planet of abundance. We can eradicate poverty within our lifetimes.
lender.occupational_info: My professional passion is understanding consumer behavior, and helping build brands.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I can and I care to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Business owner and technology specialist

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed. This is an opportunity to pay the blessing forward.

lender.name: OLAOLUWA
lender.loan_because: I want this loan to pursue my educational career at the university of Derby,UK to study for a one year top up (Bsc) degreee in electrical/electronics engineering.
lender.occupational_info: My work is interesting because it all about help fox to use effective the softwares and all solve hardware problem. e.g repair and fix PC, laptops e.t.c

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I know what its like to get a helping hand and want to be the one pulling upwards from here forward.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an electronic reporting service that helps people invest their money more wisely.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount of money to me can be a better future for someone in another country. We have all needed a little helping hand in our lives at sometime. I am happy to pass that tradition on to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies understand and follow various laws regarding employee safety and protection of the environment. I also train their employees to recognize various hazards in their workplace so they will return home to their loved ones at the end of the workday.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: Trying to make a little difference for a better world.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I love people and I think this is a great opportunity to help others.

lender.name: Siobhan & Larry
lender.loan_because: We wake up every morning not wanting for anything! We have to share that. We should share that.

lender.name: Abish & Smriti
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed to enjoy life and wanted to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: This is the best thing we have done so far. We hope the loan will help all the families see better days.

lender.name: Linda & Brian
lender.loan_because: We "Believe" that if everyone could help just a little this world would be such a better place! We also started a business 20 years ago on a dream ... a wish... a prayer... and today they have all come true :) We are truly blessed with four healthy grown boys and know how important the meaning of family is ! Never stop dreaming !
lender.occupational_info: We have a Heating and Plumbing Business in the State of Vermont in the USA.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to give other people the opportunity to start a business and become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I raise 6 children, and I go to school so that I can become a midwife.

lender.name: Juanita
lender.loan_because: I believe that every person should have an opportunity to thrive.

lender.name: melanie & peter
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves an opportunity to reap the benefits of their hard work.
lender.occupational_info: we have been traveling our country for a year and visiting people who live well and make a difference in their communities. we intend on putting this real-life education into practice as we stay in towns for longer lengths of time.

lender.name: spurfer
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by the generosity of my parents and grandparents, and it seems fitting that I should extend their generosity to others.

lender.name: Edwards Middle School
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help poor people around the world while we learn. Also, many of our families come from poor countries - and we want to help our global friends, neighbors and family members.
lender.occupational_info: We are seventh grade students in a geography class at the Edwards Middle School in Charlestown, MA. Our school is located just four blocks from the Bunker Hill Monument. Paul Revere started his "midnight ride" just down the road from here.

lender.name: Bennett
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Retired corporate CFO

lender.name: Satye
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to be so lucky and have more than I truly need. I want help those who have been not so fortunate and truly need simple things that many of us take for granted. I also believe that because this is the American way - to reach out and help those who need it the most.
lender.occupational_info: I came to the US over 20 years ago with close to nothing. I've always worked hard and today have my own small business that is quite successful. So, I relate to the enterprunerial spirit.

lender.name: Terrance
lender.occupational_info: I help develop clean renewable sources of energy like Sun, Wind, and Water Power

lender.name: kevin
lender.loan_because: sometimes you gan just use that little extra help
lender.occupational_info: manage to cause troublsome situations wherever I may roam

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to make a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Greg, Angie & Alex
lender.loan_because: we want to provide opportunity for those trying to make a better life for their families and communities
lender.occupational_info: I primarily provide technical support and direction for the research, development, and deployment of air traffic control systems.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: Not everyone is born into the same situation. Looking to help those who are trying to better themselves and their community
lender.occupational_info: University Student

lender.name: Saint Bonaventure High
lender.loan_because: We are in a high school economics class in Ventura, California. This organization (Kiva) provides a way that we can help people in other countries get ahead and support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: High school students trying to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Isabella
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Retired.

lender.name: Wallace's
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I am a women business owner with a desire to give back to others who want to work hard and succeed. My business allows me to balance work and family. I'm hoping to help others who want to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: Helping government agencies come up with ways to better serve their citizens. We are all about helping communities make better citizens for their people.

lender.name: Fishguy
lender.loan_because: For all my day-to-day struggles and having to keep a tight budget, the money I spend on a lunch is enough for someone else out there to feed their family for a week. I want to help someone else get their chance to have a better life.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a hand from time to time

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who may need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a lawyer and I work with him as his secretary/office manager. We have three boys who are out on their own.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: it's a way for me to make a tangible difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large foundation on issues related to Latin America.

lender.name: jose
lender.loan_because: I like to help anyone achieved their dreams. Imagine, If we all help each other out, It would be a perfect world or close to it.
lender.occupational_info: I like to think of me as an artist. Drawing, painting, creating. Just placing it all on canvas or any other surface for that matter. I'm just a friend willing to help.

lender.name: ken
lender.loan_because: it makes showing up to work every day easier to swallow
lender.occupational_info: i get people excited about coming to work

lender.name: theresa
lender.loan_because: it feels good ..

lender.name: Tatiana
lender.loan_because: I loan because ,thinggs are very difficult here in my region and specially on me ,i don't have any support to help my dream come true
lender.occupational_info: my work can just be descibe as a little transportation company ,fast and with profit anyway ,cause iam in africa ,and transportion is very important here ..

lender.name: Hirle
lender.loan_because: it is a smart and efficient way to help people all around the world.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a good life. A small donation can make a big difference in the lives of many around the world. It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Helping others in time of need.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: Our family cares and believes that others deserve the chance to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired school teacher currently caring for my husband who is a stroke victim. He is confined to a wheelchair but works hard as an artist doing his painting and sketching a good part of the day. We both enjoy going for short drives especially near the ocean and enjoy feeding and watching the birds in our yard.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I'm always looking for a chance to do something to help people less fluorinate then myself. The idea of Kiva is ingenious and my hope is that it really takes off.
lender.occupational_info: I over see and manage a company that installs and repairs air conditioning and plumbing in large scale commercial buildings and airports.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurial spirit lives in every corner of the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: People have always been there in my life when I needed a hand. Now that I am on my feet, it is my turn to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses tell others about their products

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a youth sports organization that teams boys from 10 years old to 18 years old how to play baseball.

lender.name: Karen & Don
lender.loan_because: It is an honor to help others reach their goals. They inspire us by their work ethic and family values.
lender.occupational_info: Self employed woodworker of doors & mouldings.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to support hard-working people as they start their own businesses.

lender.name: Klaus
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone less fortunate than myself

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I got lucky in life, so I'll spread some around.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I have compassion for the poor resulting from inequality in the world systems.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small rural property, where I run a few sheep, vegetable gardens and fruit trees

lender.name: Mr.
lender.loan_because: I believe it makes the difference.
lender.occupational_info: Bring ideas and visions to reality

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I sell machines that are used to make semiconductor devices (computer chips)

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I believe empowerment can change oppression into opportunity for women worldwide .

lender.name: Shareen
lender.loan_because: We all needed help at one time or another. And if a small loan can help make all the difference in the world to another family, why NOT do it?

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I received a gift. Until then, I had never heard of kiva.org. Now I am so happy i have!!
lender.occupational_info: I teach children of all nationalities, mostly Spanish speaking, who are ten years old.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I am truly blessed and I want to give back
lender.occupational_info: I help people communicate about what they do in order to help them reach their goals

lender.name: Andrew W
lender.loan_because: It is great to see others happy. Everyone deserves at least one opportunity to make their life a great one and for those around them.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help people out. It gives you a great feeling knowing that you have helped to fulfill someones dreams. I think that a persons goals and dreams are the most important things they have and if I can help them achieve them, then I have changed the world, at least for that one person.
lender.occupational_info: I recently got a job to serve as the Americorps Vista memeber at my university. I don't get paid a lot but it gives me a chance to give back to the community and make a difference. Think peace corp but domestic.

lender.name: Darrin
lender.loan_because: it's a great big universe and we're all really puny, we're just tiny little dots about the size of Mickey Rooney, it's a great universe and we're not

lender.name: Polly Franks
lender.occupation: Executive Director of the Franks Foundation
lender.loan_because: People have been so good to me, I like to give back and help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a nonprofit organization that helps victims of childhood sexual abuse.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: My wife and I started our own business two years ago. I know how hard it is to get your business going and to maintain it. a person can use all the help they can get.
lender.occupational_info: We test dairy cows for milk production, and also take milk samples on individual cows and send them to a lab to be tested for various things, like butterfat,protein,somatic cell counts(white blood cells in milk)

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to see how your loan can directly impact a person's life and know who that person is. there's risk, but there's hope, too, for bettering someone's life.

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who want to help themselves

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: "The Master has no posessions. The more he does for others, the happier he is. The more he gives to others, The wealthier he is." Stephen Mitchell's interpretation of the Tao Te Ching by Lao Tsu
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes products for the skin.

lender.name: Phillip & Manjula
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. My wife and I are passionate about being of service and sharing the blessings of life!
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and teacher. My wife is a businesswoman in the field of computers. I create inspirational art and teach healing classes while my wife takes care of the business end of things. We both feel it is our life's work to be of service to humanity and to share the blessings!

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: so many people have made a difference in my life over the past year. This feels like an amazing way to give back...
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and raise my two children, one of them is currently battling Leukemia.

lender.name: TheChadd
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of construction. I estimate costs for prospective projects and coordinate jobs already in progress.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I now make a comfortable living and feel I should help other people achieve the same. It is also an opportunity to create and improve international relations.
lender.occupational_info: I work fulltime for a small company, repairing and remodeling houses.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: it's so easy to make a difference in the world!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying International Relations at the University of Toronto.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world." --Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I love working at the company my dad started in 1968 - Amigo Mobility. We manufacture mobility products for people with walking disabilities.

lender.name: Lowell
lender.loan_because: it means something.
lender.occupational_info: I run The Metaverse Journal, a virtual worlds news site and use a proportion of its revenue for Kiva.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able.
lender.occupational_info: Doctor specializing in heart disease

lender.name: Jennifer and Matt
lender.loan_because: We can!

lender.name: Hannelore
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro finance is the most effective way to make this world better, one person at a time.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I really have a genuine need to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time college student going to school to be an Art Teacher.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to bootstrap a business and how no-one will loan you money, well at least banks. I also believe these small loans and the pooling effect kiva provides goes much further in these developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell used medical and lab equipment. I buy it from one facility and turn around and sell to another. I started with virtually no money and just rolled my profits into more inventory.

lender.name: Rebecca Jayne
lender.loan_because: I'm a loaner! :) Live Aloha!

lender.name: Jane M
lender.loan_because: I can. And I'm grateful to have an opportunity to help a few others.
lender.occupational_info: I coach people in how to do things better in their business or organisation. For example, put in better systems, have better procedures.

lender.name: The McKenzie Family
lender.loan_because: It is awesome to see the repayments made so quickly and then we are able to loan the same money again and again.
lender.occupational_info: In public health, we work to improve and protect the health of our community by ensuring clean water, healthy food, preventing disease outbreaks, and educating the community about good health choices for a long and healthy life.

lender.name: B.E.M.
lender.loan_because: Wind blows, rain falls, and we all live on the same spinning ball, together.

lender.name: Evette
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to be a blessing.

lender.name: Forrest
lender.loan_because:
I want to give hope. My motivation comes from my Maker. I loan as an act of love.
I like Annesha's (field partner) mission statement: "To help establish human dignity among the poor and marginalized through institution building and empowerment."
lender.occupational_info: Student of Finance at Texas A&M University

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to have something to offer.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist, and I teach students how to take photographs.

lender.name: Trevor & Daniel
lender.loan_because: It makes us happy to help people.
lender.occupational_info: We are homeschooled and this helps us learn about other countries and how to help people.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I have enough and others do not.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I remember when I needed help and it didn't come. I hope I can be there for others at the right time.
lender.occupational_info: I develop digital content for all venues.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: it has a direct, immediate impact on people's lives; it is easy and fun to learn of other cultures.

lender.name: emily
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed

lender.name: Tisha
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to help those in need, but don't have a lot of resources myself. This way, I am still able to affect someone, even in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital and help women during labor and then I assist in the delivery of their babies.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a college preparatory girls' boarding and day school.

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: To help other hard working people to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It is more fun than just buying presents for people. I love getting the updates letting me know that the recipients are paying back their loans because it makes me happy to know they are succeeding in their business venture enough to pay back their loan. And it gives you a sense of helping others by simply clicking a button.
lender.occupational_info: Children, Spanish, Teaching, Translating....etc

lender.name: Thunder
lender.loan_because: Loki says so.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: God is so good to me . . . I want to help others do what I have been able to do. I have built my business from scratch - others need to be able to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: Internet Advertising for Small Businesses.

lender.name: James

lender.name: Sylwia and Mike
lender.loan_because: We're lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: We push buttons on machines that make them talk to other machines.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: I always ask myself if I'm doing enough to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I help the Dr. during surgery by passing him/her the instrument he/she needs so that the surgery can go faster and smoother.

lender.name: lance
lender.loan_because: i am both a national and world citizen

I just want to Help others and make this world a better place to stay.
My dream is to create a better world for everybody. World Peace

lender.name: Gideon

lender.name: Nikki

lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference...

lender.name: andrew

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want to help out, and Kiva offers a way to help people to help themselves, rather than prolong the problem.

lender.occupational_info: I help students that have learning disabilities or have emotional issues.

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: Setting up your own business is such an amazing thing. If I can support somebody to make her/his dream come true, that's just great!

lender.name: Cathrin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves with being proactive
lender.occupational_info: I am the assistant at the technical department os telecommunication company. My duties are - among others - drawing plans of our locations and

lender.name: elyse
lender.loan_because: I just wanted to give something back. I can't think of a better way than to help someone become financially independent and secure.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Whole Foods Market, a natural grocery store.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I believe in the program and that it does make a difference in the lives of individuals and families.

lender.name: Charlie/Sharon
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping our fellow citizens of the world, hopefully providing some peace and kindness throughout the planet.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: People must reach out and help people. I know that the little that I do here will make a big difference in peoples lives. On my birthday I give to others. It is the gift I give myself
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired. For years I did estate liquidations. I helped people dispose of their personal belongings inorder to prepare them to go into a different phase of their life

lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to be an entrepreneur.

lender.name: Abigail
